title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for answer with reason

The number of people waiting in line is increasing because people move onto the ride at a rate of 800 people per hour and for 2<t<3, r(t)>800.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for answer with reason

The number of people waiting in line is increasing because people move onto the ride at a rate of 800 people per hour and for 2<t<3, r(t)>800.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for answer with reason

The number of people waiting in line is increasing because people move onto the ride at a rate of 800 people per hour and for 2<t<3, r(t)>800.
